title: Azir bug calls for Ultra Rapid Fire Mode weekend, any objections?

replies.body:
Stop attacking people for little to no reason.

I don't think it's being greedy to ask for a rich company to do something to make up for the mistake(s), especially when what he's asking for wouldn't cost them much of anything.

Thank you InsaneSamurai. 

Also I'm not being greedy Animorpherv1 

1) I bought Azir with RP
2) I'm not asking for something specifically for myself, its for the community.
3) all they need to do is reactivate it... no new code needed

And then take it down again due to bugs due to patches. They kinda hacked URF mode in, didn't design it to last, just to be bug-free for that one patch. They'll probably bring it back eventually the same way.

Also, Azir being disabled has no relation to URF mode. I don't care about URF mode, so spending time and money to make URF mode work for this patch, drawing players from ascension, does not make me feel better over Azir being disabled.

"I don't like [X] so bring back URF as compensation" is:

A) SUPER ENTITLED
B) Even if it DID come back, it would be super glitchy and buggy because they wouldn't have worked on it for the time they needed to.
C) Really silly as it will come back eventually
D) Really stupid because after a week it became "play OP things or be raged at" just like yoloq.
You don't realize how much time it takes to actually MAKE things for the community, do you? Asking for compensation game modes means buggy and glitchy things that aren't fun.
